mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.NAME, M.PASSWORD, M.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_NAME, M.ENABLED FROM ATOS_MEMBER M INNER JOIN ATOS_ROLE R ON M.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_CODE WHERE M.ID = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATOS_MEMBER (ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, ROLE_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{roleId})
